# Comparing gnuplot vs draw

## Using gnuplot (default)

```{maxima}
#| plot: true
#| plot_backend: "gnuplot"
#| fig-cap: "Plot using gnuplot backend"
#| label: fig-gnuplot
plot2d([sin(x), cos(x)], [x, -2*%pi, 2*%pi]);
```

## Using draw package

```{maxima}
#| plot: true
#| plot_backend: "draw"
#| fig-cap: "Plot using draw package"
#| label: fig-draw
draw2d(
  color = blue,
  explicit(sin(x), x, -2*%pi, 2*%pi),
  color = red,
  explicit(cos(x), x, -2*%pi, 2*%pi),
  grid = true,
  title = "Sine and Cosine"
);
```

Draw package offers more control over styling!
